department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 22 at 14:00hrs DST. All bids submitted after November 22 at 24:00hrs DST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: This work will consist of Demolition of an existing cafeteria space at the DND Carling Campus, and re-fit of a new laboratory setting for DND Technical Evaluation Centre (TEC).
